participant_id.description: A participant identifier, matching a participant entity found in the dataset. Values in participant_id MUST be unique.

group.description: Experimental group the participant belonged to

levels.no_diabetes: Participants from the cohort with no diabetes
levels.lifestyle_controlled_diabetes: Participants from the cohort of lifestyle controlled-diabetes
levels.oral_medication_controlled_diabetes: Participants from the cohort of oral medication controlled diabetes
levels.insulin_controlled_diabetes: Participants from the cohort of insulin controlled diabetes

<datatype_folder_name>.description: There MUST be one entry per datatype folder in the dataset, with the entry named exactly as the folder name.

levels.full: All the expected data for that datatype is available for the particiant
levels.partial: Not all of the expected data for that datatype is available for the particiant
levels.none: None of the expected data for that datatype is available for the particiants
